About me

BIO

I am a computer science student at University of Zielona GÃ³ra. I work as a developer in Transition Technologies PSC. My main skills are centered around front-end technologies but I also have gained Thingworx development skills. I am also interested in AngularJs and StencilJs frameworks and I have a little experience in single page web development. I try to spend my free time on the golf course 🏌. I really like cycling 🚴 and love everything about soccer ⚽

student

My diploma thesis is about indoor positioning system. I created indoor mapping of my faculty, where you can calculate and draw the best route to your goal from current location. Check it on my work subpage

Developer

At work I create an Internet of Things solutions. Mainly I make an user interface and also start my adventure with embedded systems. After hours I improve my web development skills about Angular and pure JS. However, progressive web app is next step in my development and this is a PWA. Download app directly from your browser!

human

I love traveling and discovering new places. On a daily basis, I spend my free time riding bike. Try to spend 10 hours per week on my bike. Also, I'm taking part in the golf course for a membership green card. My first and the best hobby is soccer and I'm a big fan Arsenal FC. COYG!
